description: KSU Kennesaw State University Owls Alumni Fleece Crewneck Pullover Sweatshirt Black
These Alumni College Fleece Crewneck Sweatshirt feature a colorful digitally printed logo of your college and team in the USA. This fleece sweater is extremely soft and comfortable.

These relaxed crewnecks are great to wear around campus, games, and even to outside! Keep you warm during the cold seasons, but cool enough to wear to class, when you are out and about. Be sure to show off your school pride and team spirit!
They come in popular colors such as White, Grey, Blue, Red, Green, Black, Royal, Maroon and Forest, depending on the school. While they are sized for men, anyone can wear them! Just pick your size.
